record.title: PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3915
record.narrative:
PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3915 -- (House of Representatives - November 15, 2007)

[Page: H13978]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that, during consideration of H.R. 3915 pursuant to House Resolution 825, the Chair may reduce to 2 minutes the minimum time for electronic voting under clause 6 of rule XVIII and clauses 8 and 9 of rule XX.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Massachusetts?
